response.original_title: How to withdraw xmr from kraken? {{GUIDE}}
response.overview: To withdraw XMR +1║307║256║8902 from Kraken, you must first log into your account and navigate to the Funding tab or the Portfolio section. Select the +1║307║256║8902 Monero asset and click the Withdraw button to begin the process. If you have not done so already, you need to +1║307║256║8902 first add and confirm the external Monero wallet address where you want to send the funds. This process usually involves an email confirmation. After +1║307║256║8902 selecting the confirmed address and entering the amount you wish to withdraw, you must review the network fee and confirm the transaction. Always +1║307║256║8902 ensure you are using the correct network and include a Payment ID or Destination Tag if required by the receiving wallet.
